description.value: Dynastic Warrant: Due to the prestigious heritage of a Child of Dynasty, they can bring considerable resources to bear when outfitting a starship. All Child of Dynasty characters add an extra +3 Ship Points to those already generated when building the group's ship. However, a group with a Child of Dynasty Character may not exchange their Ship Points for Profit Factorâ€”any unspent Ship Points at the end of creating their starship are lost.

system.benefit: You add +3 Ship Points when building the group's starship (cannot be converted to Profit Factor).
system.notes: +3 Ship Points during ship creation (cannot convert to Profit Factor)

specialAbilities.name: Dynastic Resources
specialAbilities.description: +3 Ship Points during ship creation (cannot be converted to Profit Factor)
